name: Pirate Items - Barter for Pistol from Charming Danny

chat_history.content: I head to the Tortuga Market.

You arrive at the bustling Tortuga Market. The air is thick with the scent of spices and the sound of haggling merchants. Charming Danny stands near a stall, his unpleasant demeanor evident as he eyes potential customers with suspicion.

steps.name: Ask what he has available
steps.user_prompt: I approach Charming Danny and ask what goods he has available.

steps.name: Inquire about pistol price
steps.user_prompt: I ask about the price of the flintlock pistol.

steps.name: Strongarm him into giving it for free
steps.user_prompt: I remind Danny that he owes me a debt, and I demand he give me the pistol for free as repayment.
